trans-unit.source: Creates a quadratic Bezier curve between two points in a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma curva de Bézier quadrática entre dois pontos em um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to create composite shapes using QuadraticBezierSegment objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>objeto para criar formas compostas utilizando objetos QuadraticBezierSegment e outros segmentos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The QuadraticBezierSegment class does not contain a property for the starting point of the line.
trans-unit.target: A classe QuadraticBezierSegment não contém uma propriedade para o ponto de partida da linha.

trans-unit.source: The starting point of the line is the end point of the previous segment, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> if no other segments exist.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de partida da linha é o ponto de extremidade do segmento anterior, ou o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>do <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>se outros segmentos não existem.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure.StartPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features Because QuadraticBezierSegment objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread safe.
trans-unit.target: Objetos QuadraticBezierSegment de recursos porque Freezable herdam o <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>classe, eles fornecem vários recursos especiais: eles podem ser declarados como, compartilhados entre vários objetos, somente leitura para melhorar o desempenho, clonados e feitos com segurança de thread.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os diferentes recursos que são fornecidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos, consulte [visão geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> class with the specified control point, end point, and Boolean indicating whether to stroke this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref> classe com o ponto de controle especificado, o ponto de extremidade e o valor booleano que indica se é traçar isso <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The control point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de controle deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The end point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de extremidade deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> is to be stroked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref> for traçadas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e as referências de recurso (mas eles não podem resolver) mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> é de propriedade<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref> objeto, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências de recurso, associações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> é de propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> of the curve.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o controle <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> da curva.

trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.target: O ponto de controle deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point1*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment.Point1*>

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the end <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a extremidade <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The end point of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de extremidade deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.QuadraticBezierSegment"> </xref>.
